description: Major Update to the Afrin Archive! 168 Hours, 57 Minutes of Transcripts, 263 Interview Videos Transcribed, and 366 Villages Recorded
Made a simple Hijri to Gregorian / Gregorian to Hijri converter. It may be the only add-free calender calculator out there!
Added Lesson 11! Hope you like numbers...

- Completed the Ottoman Sultan Series.
- Phased out audio older than 5 months old due to lack of space.
Added Lesson 9 to the Learn Ottoman Turkish Course. It's a big one!
Researched and added etymology sections to around 340 villages. Also increased the archive's number of villages from 350 to contain 365.
Added and consolidated villages to better reflect reality. There were previously 367 villages listed as seperate villages, which was not correct. There are now 350 distinct villages in the archive.
Made a new Video and Poster about the Ottoman Empire during the Little Ice Age.
Added foundational data to hundreds of village files.
